00001 ! ======================
00002 !
00003 !   VIS_FIELDS
00004 !
00005 !   Send field data to VISIT for visualisation of scalar volumetric data
00006 !
00007 !
00008 ! ======================
00009 
00010 subroutine vis_vecfields_nbody(timestamp)
00011 
00012 
00013   use physvars
00014   use treevars
00015   implicit none   
00016   include 'mpif.h'
00017 
00018   integer, intent(in) :: timestamp
00019   real*4, dimension(3*ngx*ngy*ngz) :: field1
00020   real*4, dimension(ngx,ngy,ngz) :: jelec_x,jelec_y,jelec_z
00021   real :: s, simtime, dummy, xd,yd,zd, dx, dz, dy, epond_max
00022   real :: xt, yt, zt, rt
00023   integer, parameter :: ngmax=100
00024   integer :: i, j, k, ioffset,ixd, iyd, izd, ilev, lcount, iskip,itlas
00025   integer :: lvisit_active=0, ierr 
00026   integer :: npx, npy, npz, ng, jfoc, kfoc, nave
00027   real :: norm,j0
00028   integer :: iskip_x, iskip_y, iskip_z
00029   integer :: fselect=0 ! field selector
00030   integer :: incdf
00031   real*4 :: grid_pars(24)  ! origins and mesh size of vis fields
00032   character(30) :: cfile
00033   character(5) :: cme
00034   character(6) :: cdump, cvis
00035 
00036   simtime = dt*(itime+itime_start)
00037 
00038 #ifdef VISIT_NBODY
00039   if (me==0)   call flvisit_nbody2_check_connection(lvisit_active)
00040   call MPI_BCAST( lvisit_active, 1, MPI_INTEGER, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00041 #endif
00042 
00043   if (lvisit_active==0 )then
00044      if (me==0) write(*,*) 'VIS_NBODY | No connection to visualization'
00045   endif
00046 
00047 ! Connected to vis, so proceed with field select & gather
00048 
00049 #ifdef VISIT_NBODY
00050 ! Fetch user-selected config from vis (TODO)
00051 !  if (me==0 .and. lvisit_active.ne.0) call flvisit_nbody2_selectvecfields_recv(fselect)
00052          write (*,*) "VIS_NBODY | Selected vector field",fselect
00053 #endif
00054 
00055   fselect=2  ! Manual select - B-field
00056 
00057   ! get filename suffix from dump counter
00058   do i=0,4
00059      cdump(6-i:6-i) =  achar(mod(timestamp/10**i,10) + 48)  
00060   end do
00061   cdump(1:1) = achar(timestamp/10**5 + 48)
00062 
00063   ng = ngx*ngy*ngz                         ! total # gridpoints
00064   ! Merge sums for gridded fields 
00065 
00066 ! Should combine vec components into single array
00067   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(jxe_loc(1:ngx,1:ngy,1:ngz), jelec_x, ng, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00068   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(jye_loc(1:ngx,1:ngy,1:ngz), jelec_y, ng, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00069   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(jze_loc(1:ngx,1:ngy,1:ngz), jelec_z, ng, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00070 
00071 
00072   if (me==0 ) then
00073 
00074      lcount=1
00075 
00076      ! limit size of field data to 100^3
00077      !     iskip_x = ngx/ngmax + 1
00078      !     iskip_y = ngy/ngmax + 1
00079      !     iskip_z = ngz/ngmax + 1
00080      iskip_x = 1
00081      iskip_y = 1
00082      iskip_z = 1
00083 
00084 
00085      !     npx = ngx/iskip_x + mod(ngx,2)
00086      !     npy = ngy/iskip_y + mod(ngy,2)
00087      !     npz = ngz/iskip_z + mod(ngz,2)
00088      npx = ngx
00089      npy = ngy
00090      npz = ngz
00091 
00092      dx = xl/ngx
00093      dz = zl/ngz
00094      dy = yl/ngy
00095 
00096      j0 = 1.0
00097 
00098      do k=1,ngz,iskip_z
00099         do j=1,ngy,iskip_y
00100            do i=1,ngx,iskip_x
00101 
00102 
00103  ! Vector field selection
00104               f1: select case(fselect)
00105               case(1)  ! electron current 
00106                 field1(lcount) = jelec_x(i,j,k)  
00107                 field1(lcount+1) = jelec_y(i,j,k)  
00108                 field1(lcount+2) = jelec_z(i,j,k)  
00109 !            field1(lcount+1)=0.
00110 !            field1(lcount+2)=0.
00111 
00112               case(0) 
00113                 xt = dx*(i-0.5)
00114                 yt = dy*(j-0.5)-yl/2.
00115                 zt = dz*(k-0.5)-zl/2.
00116                 rt = sqrt(yt**2+zt**2)
00117 !               norm = rt*exp(-2*rt/yl)*xt/xl
00118                 norm = 1.
00119                 field1(lcount) = j0/3.
00120 !               field1(lcount) = 0.
00121                 field1(lcount+1) = -norm*zt/yl
00122                 field1(lcount+2) = norm*yt/zl
00123 
00124               case(2) 
00125 
00126                 if (beam_config_in==7)  then ! Constant B in z-direction - either charge
00127                   field1(lcount) = 0.
00128                   field1(lcount+1) = 0.
00129                   field1(lcount+2) = vosc
00130 
00131                 else if (beam_config_in==17)  then !  Z-pinch: circular B in x,y
00132                   xt = dx*(i-0.5) - plasma_centre(1)
00133                   yt = dy*(j-0.5) - plasma_centre(2)
00134                   rt = sqrt(xt**2+yt**2)
00135                   field1(lcount) = -vosc*yt/rt
00136                   field1(lcount+1) =  vosc*xt/rt
00137                   field1(lcount+2) = 0.
00138 
00139                 else if (beam_config_in==37)  then !  Mirror in Bz
00140                   xt = dx*(i-0.5) - plasma_centre(1)
00141                   yt = dy*(j-0.5) - plasma_centre(2)
00142                   rt = sqrt(xt**2+yt**2)
00143                   zt = dz*(k-0.5)-zl/2.
00144                   if (zt>-zl/2. .and. zt<zl/2.) then
00145                     field1(lcount) = -vosc/5.*xt/rt*(2*zt/zl)
00146                     field1(lcount+1) = -vosc/5.*yt/rt*(2*zt/zl)
00147                     field1(lcount+2) = vosc*(2*zt/zl)**2+vosc/5.
00148                   else
00149                     field1(lcount:lcount+2) = 0.
00150         
00151                   endif
00152                 endif
00153               end select f1
00154               lcount=lcount+3
00155            end do
00156         end do
00157      end do
00158 
00159 !       write (*,*) 'Max currents:',maxval(jelec_x),maxval(jelec_y),maxval(jelec_z)
00160         write (*,*) 'Min/Max current:',minval(field1),maxval(field1)
00161 
00162 
00163 #ifdef VISIT_NBODY
00164       call flvisit_nbody2_check_connection(lvisit_active)
00165 
00166 ! Tell vis which fields are coming
00167 
00168   if (lvisit_active.ne.0) then
00169 !     call flvisit_nbody2_selectedvecfields_send(fselect)
00170 
00171 #ifdef NETCDFLIB
00172 ! Netcdf write
00173 !         if (netcdf) call ncnbody_putselfield( ncid, simtime, fselect1, fselect2, fselect3, fselect4, incdf )
00174 #endif
00175 
00176 !  Set up vis field grid - just one field at present
00177 !   do i=0,3
00178     i=0
00179      grid_pars(6*i+1:6*i+3) = 0.
00180      grid_pars(6*i+4) = dx
00181      grid_pars(6*i+5) = dy
00182      grid_pars(6*i+6) = dz
00183 !   end do
00184 
00185   call flvisit_nbody2_vecfielddesc_send(grid_pars,1,6)
00186 
00187 #ifdef NETCDFLIB
00188 !   if (netcdf) call ncnbody_putvecfielddesc( ncid, simtime, grid_pars, incdf )
00189 #endif
00190 
00191 !   write(*,*) 'Grids: ',grid_pars
00192 
00193 !      if (fselect>0) then
00194          write (*,*) "VIS_NBODY | Shipping vector field",fselect," min/max =", &
00195         minval(field1),maxval(field1)
00196 
00197        call flvisit_nbody2_vecfield1_send(field1,npx,npy,npz,3)   
00198 
00199 #ifdef NETCDFLIB
00200 !         if (netcdf) call ncnbody_putvecfield( ncid, simtime, 1, npx, npy, npz, field1, incdf )
00201 #endif
00202 
00203 !      endif
00204   endif
00205 #endif
00206 
00207 endif
00208 
00209 
00210 
00211 end subroutine vis_vecfields_nbody
00212
